# Security Policy

## Supported Version

> | **Legend** | **Description** |
> |:-:|:--|
> | L | **LTS:** Long term supported. |
> | ‚úî | **Active / Current:** Currently supported. |
> | üëé{üêõ} | **Partly (Issue):** Partly supported due to confirmed contains bugs and/or issues. |
> | üëé{üßì} | **Partly (Old):** Partly supported due to deprecated by newer versions. |
> | ‚ùå{üêõ} | **No (Issue):** Not supported due to confirmed contains bugs and/or issues. |
> | ‚ùå{üßì} | **No (Old):** Not supported due to too old. |

| **Tag / Version** | **Target** | **Support** |
|:-:|:-:|:-:|
| >= v7.1.1 | NodeJS v10.13.0 + NPM v6.4.1 | L |
| v7.0.X \~ v7.1.0 | NodeJS v14.15.0 + NPM v6.14.8 | L |
| v7.0.0 | NodeJS v14.15.0 + NPM v6.14.8 | ‚ùå{üßì} |
| ^ v6.4.2 | NodeJS v14.15.0 + NPM v6.14.8 | ‚ùå{üßì} |
| <= v6.4.1 | NodeJS <= v14.15.0 + NPM <= v6.14.8 | ‚ùå{üêõüßì} |

## Report Vulnerability

### Contact

Send an email to anyone who listed in here (click the link to obtain the email address):

- [hugoalh](https://github.com/hugoalh)

### Suggested Content List

- Your GitHub account username (e.g.: `@octocat`)
- Project identification name
- Affected versions (versions must be listed as supported)
- Affected files
- Issues to cause this security issue
- Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) identification numbers
- References of this security issue
